channel.title: .php Error
channel.description: [code]Fatal error: Call to a member function fetchColumn() on a non-object in /home/mythscap/public_html/includes/db.php on line 9[/code] could someone help me plz

item.title: .php Error
item.dc:creator: @q3ase q3ase
item.description:
@q3ase wrote:

[code]<?PHP
define(‘DB_HOST’, ‘localhost’);
define(‘DB_NAME’, ‘stored’);
define(‘DB_USERNAME’, ‘rooot’);
define(‘DB_PASSWORD’, ‘lolwut’);
$odb = new PDO(‘mysql:host=’ . DB_HOST . ‘;dbname=’ . DB_NAME, DB_USERNAME, DB_PASSWORD);

$sql = $odb->query(‘SELECT url FROM sitelink’);
$urlsite = $sql->fetchColumn(0);

$sql = $odb->query(‘SELECT * FROM sitetheme’);
$sitetheme = $sql->fetchColumn(0);
?>[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: .php Error
item.dc:creator: @lineage lineage
item.description:
@lineage wrote:

this is the Class/File i am Trying To fix please could you Edit this and get it so it doe’s work?[code]<?PHP
define(‘DB_HOST’, ‘localhost’);
define(‘DB_NAME’, ‘stored’);
define(‘DB_USERNAME’, ‘rooot’);
define(‘DB_PASSWORD’, ‘lolwut’);
$odb = new PDO(‘mysql:host=’ . DB_HOST . ‘;dbname=’ . DB_NAME, DB_USERNAME, DB_PASSWORD);

$sql = $odb->query(“SELECT url FROM sitelink LIMIT 1”);
$urlsite = $sql->fetchColumn(0);

$sql = $odb->query(“SELECT theme FROM sitetheme LIMIT 1”);
$sitetheme = $sql->fetchColumn(0);

?>[/code]

item.title: .php Error
item.dc:creator: @Wife_Beater Wife Beater
item.description:
@Wife_Beater wrote:

[quote=“q3ase, post:2, topic:480337”]You can not do

$result->execute(array($example))->fetchColumn();

You have to do

$result->execute(array($example));
echo $result->fetchColumn();

Also posting more details would of been nicer, Good job I knew it was PDO[/quote]

How do you only have a two star rep?

Read full topic

item.title: .php Error
item.dc:creator: @q3ase q3ase
item.description:
@q3ase wrote:

You can not do

$result->execute(array($example))->fetchColumn();

You have to do

$result->execute(array($example));
echo $result->fetchColumn();

Also posting more details would of been nicer, Good job I knew it was PDO

Read full topic
